segments.text: How big is this parking lot in our community ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So you guys should be always busy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I bet it is always full of cars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Quite the contrary , sir . Plenty of the spaces here are free when people drive their cars out to work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We plan to rent some of them out at the hourly rates .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is the hourly rate for a car like this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am not sure . But it'll be at least ten yuan an hour .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How mush would it cost if someone parks here for one hour and ten minutes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be twenty yuan , sir . We charge only by the number of hours , no split of each hour .
segments.speaker: S2
